message: Hope they hunt down Muslim converts to know what they are doing throughout America! The family of the woman who was beheaded in the meat packing plant would have appreciated our government discovering this radical convert earlier than when he was beheading this woman.
Congratulations. Magnificent effort
How do you screw this up?

Went to bed instead of showering, was real tired. Woke up, as I usually do, at 2am to go to the bathroom and kept hearing a """"thump-thump-thump"""", startlling me; turns out it was my left arm clanging on the wall, dead as a doornail. I was in the middle of having another stroke! Linda called my son who met us half way to the hospital and received treatment. However, i learned later to NEVER do that - call 911 instead. As soon as they arrive the EMT's begin treatment, forwarding vitals to the hospital, etc. and saves ER admittance time, also. Took 3 days before they'd let me out of bed to take a shower; they agreed I was ripe, lol~

Dear God, can't you people separate your personal, anecdotal experiences, from the aggregate data that is accumulated by the studies. Have you not heard the phrase """"exception to the rule."""" I'm glad your formula fed baby is smart, but that doesn't negate the conclusions drawn from the study. The inability to recognize this is incredibly self centered and reflects a serious lack of critical thinking ability.

Really it takes more faith to believe in the nonsense of evolution crap than to have faith in God. Woooo such big words with your mindless conclusions. And regarding """"the invisible space daddy"""" part of your brainless rant-we shall see how brave you really are someday when your miserable carcass stands in front of the God you so proudly and bravely mock and disbelieve in. Yes, we will see how well it works out for you. Really going to suck to be you some day but that's your choice. And no I could care less what you think nor will I come back to read any more of your uninspiring comments. Evolution is as illogical as much as it is impossible.
